alert.note: Alert for Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 2:27PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Nez Perce and northern Lewis Counties through 200 PM PDT... At 126 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Culdesac, or near Lapwai, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lapwai, Culdesac, Peck, Reubens, Spalding, Gifford and Lenore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area
